name: Button
description: An item used as a button in lists

content.name: id
content.description: a unique id for this item (provided by the system)

content.name: text_left
content.description:
optional text which can appear on the left side of the button
default: -none-

content.name: text_centre
content.description:
optional text which can appear in the centre of the button
default: -none-

content.name: text_right
content.description:
optional text which can appear on the right side of the button
default: -none-
